title: 9 - Mehran Khaghani
itunes:title: 9 - Mehran Khaghani
description: Mehran Khaghani is like the good version of if everyone’s imaginary friend came to life. Does that make sense? It will if you’ve seen him at the Comedy Cellar or anywhere performing around New York, and it definitely will once you listen to this episode. We talk about everything from mispronouncing names to trypophobia, raves to dosing. Here’s five words to describe this episode: it’s as smooth as butter.
